Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: TAS "TAS"
Reviews.Content: This unit is a piece of junk. I wish I had bought my camera form a different maker. I mean really, I should only expect it to work half the time?

ProductInfo.Features:
700 TV lines high resolution. NTSC system. IP66
Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E imager, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor
Weatherproof housing. Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Build-in 65 Infrared LEDs. 8-20mm Varifocal lens
Package including: 1 x CCD camera, 1 x power supply and 1 x camera extension cable
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E CCTV Security Camera High Resolution Weatherproof Outdoor Day Night Vision 700TVL 8-20mm Varifocal Lens 65 Infrared LEDs 3X Zoom with Power Supply and Camera Extension Cable WB8
